callback_with_context.context_function_id: Loc("war_coord_set_attack_target_tooltip") + GetIf(CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("OFFENSIVE") > 0, Format(" %s", Format(Loc("war_coordination_target_cheapest"), CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("OFFENSIVE"))) ) + { this | CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("OFFENSIVE") > FavourPoints => Loc("war_coord_cannot_set_target_tooltip") | HasAnyValidTargetToPick("OFFENSIVE") == false => Loc("war_coord_no_target_available")}
DoIf(IsContextValid(TargettingContext) == false && HasAnyValidTargetToPick("OFFENSIVE"), DoIfElse(self.IsMouseOver, self.SetState("hover"), self.SetState("active")))

Loc("war_coord_set_defend_target_tooltip") + GetIf(CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("DEFENSIVE") > 0, Format(" %s", Format(Loc("war_coordination_target_cheapest"), CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("DEFENSIVE"))) ) + { this | CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("DEFENSIVE") > FavourPoints => Loc("war_coord_cannot_set_target_tooltip") | HasAnyValidTargetToPick("DEFENSIVE") == false => Loc("war_coord_no_target_available") }
DoIf(IsContextValid(TargettingContext) == false && HasAnyValidTargetToPick("DEFENSIVE"), DoIfElse(self.IsMouseOver, self.SetState("hover"), self.SetState("active")))

Loc("war_coord_set_occupy_target_tooltip") + GetIf(CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("OCCUPY") > 0, Format(" %s", Format(Loc("war_coordination_target_cheapest"), CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("OCCUPY"))) ) + {this | CheapestTargetFavourPointsCost("OCCUPY") > FavourPoints => Loc("war_coord_cannot_set_target_tooltip") | HasAnyValidTargetToPick("OCCUPY") == false => Loc("war_coord_no_target_available") }
DoIf(IsContextValid(TargettingContext) == false && HasAnyValidTargetToPick("OCCUPY"), DoIfElse(self.IsMouseOver, self.SetState("hover"), self.SetState("active")))

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: This army is currently without a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord. A replacement will be appointed during the next turn.

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: Action Points||The green bar represents the remaining movement points this force has left. When the green bar is empty, the force will be unable to move until the next turn.

header_frame.componentleveltooltip: Once [[img:icon_growth]][[/img]]growth reaches a certain threshold, [[img:icon_pop_surplus]][[/img]]population surplus is created. This can then be spent on upgrading your settlement building, which will open an additional building slot.||{{tr:click_to_open_hp}}

callback_with_context.context_function_id: FactionContext.IsAlly && FactionContext != PlayersFaction && IsContextValid(CaravanContext) == false && IsLocalPlayersTurn
